props.activeClass: The class applied to a [MButton](/components/buttons) when activated.
props.backgroundColor: Changes the background-color for the component.
props.horizontal: Uses an alternative horizontal styling for [MButton](/components/buttons).
props.inputValue: Controls whether the component is visible or hidden. Supports the .sync modifier.
props.mandatory: Forces a value to always be selected (if available).
props.shift: Hides text of [MButton](/components/buttons) when they are not active.
props.value: Holds the value of the currently active [MButton](/components/buttons). If the button has no value supplied, its index will be used instead…
